topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54725bc86368725ecec10000#post_54725bc86368725ecec10000
Danny is better, you're right about that.

I dunno, just something about Arin rubs me the wrong way. I mean, at E3 this year they gave badges to people who won Super Smash Bros games. Arin asked if he could one anyway and when he was told no, he tried to buy one off of other winners.

He seems like such a sore loser.

Game Grumps is fine, I enjoy Danny more then Arin though like Trash

But fuck do I miss Jon, Its a shame we wont ever see them together again, I mean goodness Jon at a panel literally stated that Game Grumps was the worse part of his career and said "There was a lot of dishonesty" so...yeah...Something certainly happened. 

Also, DID SOMEONE SAY UBERHAXORNOVA!?
